Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)"] shared DatalakeURL = let DatalakeURL_Apps = "https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in DatalakeURL_Apps; [Description = "Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)"] shared EnvironmentAPI = let EnvironmentAPI = "https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in EnvironmentAPI; shared Apps = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerapps/Applications"), #"Changed modified" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Date modified", type date}}), // Filter to files that have been updated since the last Dataflow refresh OR all files if initial inventory #"Filter to recent" = Table.SelectRows( #"Changed modified", each [Date modified] >= (if List.IsEmpty(DataflowRefresh) then Date.From("1900-01-01") else Date.From(DataflowRefresh{0}))), #"Filtered to just model files" = Table.SelectRows( #"Filter to recent", each Text.EndsWith([Name], "model.json")), excludehiddenfiles = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered to just model files", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0), #"Extract Environment ID from file name" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, "EnvironmentNameFromTable", each if Text.Length([Name]) = 46 then Text.Range([Name], 0,36) else Text.Range(Text.AfterDelimiter([Name], "-", 0), 0, 36)), {{"EnvironmentNameFromTable", type text}}), #"Removed unneeded columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Extract Environment ID from file name", {"Extension", "Date accessed", "Date modified", "Date created", "Attributes", "Folder Path"}), #"Merged with environments" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Removed unneeded columns", {"EnvironmentNameFromTable"}, admin_environments, {"admin_environmentid"}, "admin_environments", JoinKind.Inner), #"Expanded enviornment columns" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged with environments", "admin_environments", {"admin_environmentid", "admin_displayname"}, {"admin_environmentid", "admin_environmentdisplayname"}), #"Get file content" = Table.AddColumn(#"Expanded enviornment columns", "Transform file", each #"Transform file"([Content])), #"Expanded file" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Get file content", "Transform file"), #"Expanded file to columns" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded file", "Transform file", {"resourceId", "environmentId", "subType", "name", "description", "uri", "tenantId", "lifecycleState", "owner", "createdTime", "createdPrincipalId", "lastModifiedTime", to model driven apps only #"Filtered to just AppModule" = Table.SelectRows(#"Expanded file to columns", each ([subType] = "AppModule")), #"Filter to unique app and environment ids" = Table.Distinct(#"Filtered to just AppModule", {"appId", "environmentId"}), #"Replaced SYSTEM createdBy" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Filter to unique app and environment ids", null, Table.SelectRows(admin_makers, each [admin_displayname] = "SYSTEM"){0}[admin_makerid], Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"createdPrincipalId"}), #"Replaced SYSTEM modifiedBy" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Replaced SYSTEM createdBy", null, Table.SelectRows(admin_makers, each [admin_displayname] = "SYSTEM"){0}[admin_makerid], Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"lastModifiedPrincipalId"}), #"Merged with makers" = with makers", "admin_makers", {"admin_makerid", "admin_userprincipalname", "admin_makerisorphaned", "admin_department", "admin_displayname", "admin_company", "admin_city", "admin_country"}, {"admin_makerid", "admin_userprincipalname", "admin_makerisorphaned", "admin_department", "admin_displayname", "admin_company", "admin_city","admin_country"}), #"Added QueriedOn" = QueriedOn", "IsOrphanText", each if [admin_makerisorphaned] = false then "No" else if [admin_makerisorphaned] = true then "Yes" else null, type text), #"Merge environmentid and appid" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added IsOrphan", "AppUniqueName", each Text.Combine({[EnvironmentNameFromTable], "_", [appId]}), type text), #"Merged with existing apps" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Merge environmentid and appid", {"AppUniqueName"}, admin_apps, {"admin_appuniquename"}, "admin_apps", JoinKind.LeftOuter), #"Expanded admin_apps" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged with existing apps", "admin_apps", {"admin_appid"}, {"admin_appid"}), #"Added generated ID" = Table.AddColumn(#"Expanded admin_apps", "GeneratedID", each try error Text.NewGuid() otherwise Text.NewGuid()), #"Inserted GUID column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added generated ID", "NewGUID", each if [admin_appid] = null then [GeneratedID] else [admin_appid]), #"Format app type" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Inserted GUID column", "AppModule", "Model Driven", Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"subType"}), #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Format app type", {{"NewGUID", type text}, {"Name", type text}, {"EnvironmentNameFromTable", msdyn_dataflow.msdyn_mashupdocument: section Section1; [Description = "Storage account you've set up to receive the Power Platform Data Export. Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)"] shared DatalakeURL = let DatalakeURL_Apps = "https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in DatalakeURL_Apps; [Description = "Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)"] shared EnvironmentAPI = let EnvironmentAPI = "https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in EnvironmentAPI; shared AppsUsage = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerapps/usage"), // For a full load, you can modify this to look further back for one run and then adjust to 30 days again after the first full run. #"Only fetch the last 30 days of data" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each Date.IsInPreviousNDays([Date modified], 30)), excludehiddenfiles = Table.SelectRows(#"Only fetch the last 30 days of data", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0), #"Get content from json file" = Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, "Transform file", each #"Transform file (8)"([Content])), #"Remove unneeded columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Get content from json file", {"Name", "Transform file"}), #"Expanded columns" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Remove unneeded columns", "Transform file", {"environmentId", "sessionId", "objectId", "appId", "timeAccessed"}, {"environmentId", "sessionId", "userId", "appId", "appLaunchTime"}), #"Remove invalid app ids" = Table.SelectRows(#"Expanded columns", each Text.Contains([appId], "-")), #"Replace errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Remove invalid app ids", {{"environmentId", null}, {"sessionId", null}, {"userId", null}, {"appId", null}, {"appLaunchTime", null}}), #"Grouped rows 1" = Table.Group(#"Replace errors", {"appId"}, {{"Last 30 days", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}, {"last app launch", each List.Max([appLaunchTime]), type any}}), #"Filtered rows to valid apps only" = Table.SelectRows(#"Grouped rows 1", each ([appId] <> "StaticRootAppId")), // Merge the app launches with existing apps only. Remove launches for apps that have been deleted. #"Merged with apps" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Filtered rows to valid apps only", {"appId"}, admin_apps, {"admin_appid"}, "admin_apps", JoinKind.Inner), #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged with apps", {{"appId", type text}, {"last app launch", type datetime}}), #"From Value" = Table.FromValue(#"Changed column type"), #"Remove Columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"From Value", Table.ColumnsOfType(#"From Value", {type table, type record, type list, type nullable binary, type binary, type function})) in #"Remove Columns"; shared #"Sample file (8)" = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerapps/usage"), #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), Navigation = #"Filtered hidden files"{0}[Content] in Navigation; shared #"Transform file (8)" = let Source = (Parameter as binary) => let Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}), #"Transformed Column" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {"Column1", Json.Document}), #"Expanded Column1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Transformed Column", "Column1", {"tenantGuid", "environmentId", "sessionId", "objectId", "appId", "buildVersion", "timeAccessed", "countryCode", "platform", "browserName", "1.0"}, {"tenantGuid", "environmentId", "sessionId", "objectId", "appId", "buildVersion", "timeAccessed", "countryCode", "platform", "browserName", "1.0"}), #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded Column1", {{"tenantGuid", type text}, {"environmentId", type text}, {"sessionId", type text}, {"objectId", type text}, {"appId", type text}, {"buildVersion", type text}, {"timeAccessed", type datetime}, {"countryCode", type text}, {"platform", type text}, {"browserName", type text}, {"1.0", Int64.Type}}) in #"Changed Type" in Source; shared admin_apps = let Source = OData.Feed(EnvironmentAPI, null, [Implementation = "2.0"]), #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Name = "admin_apps", Signature = "table"]}[Data], #"Keep columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"admin_appid"}) in #"Keep columns";

Section1;\\n[Description = \\\"Storage account you've set up to receive the Power Platform Data Export. Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)\\\"]\\nshared DatalakeURL = let\\n DatalakeURL_Apps = \\\"https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform\\\" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any]\\nin\\n DatalakeURL_Apps;\\n[Description = \\\"Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)\\\"]\\nshared EnvironmentAPI = let\\n EnvironmentAPI = \\\"https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2\\\" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any]\\nin\\n EnvironmentAPI;\\nshared AppsUsage = let\\n Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & \\\"/powerapps/usage\\\"),\\n // For a full load, you can modify this to look further back for one run and then adjust to 30 days again after the first full run.\\n #\\\"Only fetch the last 30 days of data\\\" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each Date.IsInPreviousNDays([Date modified], 30)),\\n excludehiddenfiles = Table.SelectRows(#\\\"Only fetch the last 30 days of data\\\", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),\\n excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0),\\n #\\\"Get content from json file\\\" = Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, \\\"Transform file\\\", each #\\\"Transform file (8)\\\"([Content])),\\n #\\\"Remove unneeded columns\\\" = Table.SelectColumns(#\\\"Get content from json file\\\", {\\\"Name\\\", \\\"Transform file\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Expanded columns\\\" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#\\\"Remove unneeded columns\\\", \\\"Transform file\\\", {\\\"environmentId\\\", \\\"sessionId\\\", \\\"objectId\\\", \\\"appId\\\", \\\"timeAccessed\\\"}, {\\\"environmentId\\\", \\\"sessionId\\\", \\\"userId\\\", \\\"appId\\\", \\\"appLaunchTime\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Remove invalid app ids\\\" = Table.SelectRows(#\\\"Expanded columns\\\", each Text.Contains([appId], \\\"-\\\")),\\n #\\\"Replace errors\\\" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#\\\"Remove invalid app ids\\\", {{\\\"environmentId\\\", null}, {\\\"sessionId\\\", null}, {\\\"userId\\\", null}, {\\\"appId\\\", null}, {\\\"appLaunchTime\\\", null}}),\\n #\\\"Grouped rows 1\\\" = Table.Group(#\\\"Replace errors\\\", {\\\"appId\\\"}, {{\\\"Last 30 days\\\", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}, {\\\"last app launch\\\", each List.Max([appLaunchTime]), type any}}),\\n #\\\"Filtered rows to valid apps only\\\" = Table.SelectRows(#\\\"Grouped rows 1\\\", each ([appId] <> \\\"StaticRootAppId\\\")),\\n // Merge the app launches with existing apps only. Remove launches for apps that have been deleted.\\n #\\\"Merged with apps\\\" = Table.NestedJoin(#\\\"Filtered rows to valid apps only\\\", {\\\"appId\\\"}, admin_apps, {\\\"admin_appid\\\"}, \\\"admin_apps\\\", JoinKind.Inner),\\n #\\\"Changed column type\\\" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#\\\"Merged with apps\\\", {{\\\"appId\\\", type text}, {\\\"last app launch\\\", type datetime}}),\\n #\\\"From Value\\\" = Table.FromValue(#\\\"Changed column type\\\"),\\n #\\\"Remove Columns\\\" = Table.RemoveColumns(#\\\"From Value\\\", Table.ColumnsOfType(#\\\"From Value\\\", {type table, type record, type list, type nullable binary, type binary, type function}))\\nin\\n #\\\"Remove Columns\\\";\\nshared #\\\"Sample file (8)\\\" = let\\n Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & \\\"/powerapps/usage\\\"),\\n #\\\"Filtered hidden files\\\" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),\\n Navigation = #\\\"Filtered hidden files\\\"{0}[Content]\\nin\\n Navigation;\\nshared #\\\"Transform file (8)\\\" = let\\n Source = (Parameter as binary) => let\\n Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}),\\n #\\\"Transformed Column\\\" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {\\\"Column1\\\", Json.Document}),\\n #\\\"Expanded Column1\\\" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#\\\"Transformed Column\\\", \\\"Column1\\\", {\\\"tenantGuid\\\", \\\"environmentId\\\", \\\"sessionId\\\", \\\"objectId\\\", \\\"appId\\\", \\\"buildVersion\\\", \\\"timeAccessed\\\", \\\"countryCode\\\", \\\"platform\\\", \\\"browserName\\\", \\\"1.0\\\"}, {\\\"tenantGuid\\\", \\\"environmentId\\\", \\\"sessionId\\\", \\\"objectId\\\", \\\"appId\\\", \\\"buildVersion\\\", \\\"timeAccessed\\\", \\\"countryCode\\\", \\\"platform\\\", \\\"browserName\\\", \\\"1.0\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Changed Type\\\" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#\\\"Expanded Column1\\\", {{\\\"tenantGuid\\\", type text}, {\\\"environmentId\\\", type text}, {\\\"sessionId\\\", type text}, {\\\"objectId\\\", type text}, {\\\"appId\\\", type text}, {\\\"buildVersion\\\", type text}, {\\\"timeAccessed\\\", type datetime}, {\\\"countryCode\\\", type text}, {\\\"platform\\\", type text}, {\\\"browserName\\\", type text}, {\\\"1.0\\\", Int64.Type}})\\nin\\n #\\\"Changed Type\\\"\\nin\\n Source;\\nshared admin_apps = let\\n Source = OData.Feed(EnvironmentAPI, null, [Implementation = \\\"2.0\\\"]),\\n #\\\"Navigation 1\\\" = Source{[Name = \\\"admin_apps\\\", Signature = \\\"table\\\"]}[Data],\\n #\\\"Keep columns\\\" = Table.SelectColumns(#\\\"Navigation 1\\\", {\\\"admin_appid\\\"})\\nin\\n #\\\"Keep columns\\\";\\n\"},\"annotations\":[{\"name\":\"pbi:QueryGroups\",\"value\":\"null\"}]}"}

msdyn_dataflow.msdyn_mashupdocument:
section Section1; [Description = "Storage account you've set up to receive the Power Platform Data Export. Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)"] shared DatalakeURL = let DatalakeURL_Apps = "https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in DatalakeURL_Apps; [Description = "Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)"] shared EnvironmentAPI = let EnvironmentAPI = "https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in EnvironmentAPI; shared #"Transform file (10)" = let Source = (Parameter as binary) => let Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}), #"Transformed Column" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {"Column1", Json.Document}), #"Expanded Column1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Transformed Column", "Column1", {"resourceId", "connectorType"}), #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded Column1", {{"resourceId", type text}, {"connectorType", type text}})
in #"Changed Type" in Source; shared FlowConnRef = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerautomate/FlowConnectionReference"), #"Changed modified" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Date modified", type date}}), // Filter to files that have been updated since the last Dataflow refresh OR all files if initial inventory #"Filter to recent" = Table.SelectRows( #"Changed msdyn_dataflow.msdyn_mashupdocument: section Section1; [Description = "Storage account you've set up to receive the Power Platform Data Export. Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)"] shared DatalakeURL = let DatalakeURL_Apps = "https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in DatalakeURL_Apps; [Description = "Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)"] shared EnvironmentAPI = let EnvironmentAPI = "https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in EnvironmentAPI; shared FlowUsage = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerautomate/usage"), // For a full load, you can modify this to look further back for one run and then adjust to 3 days again after the first full run. #"Only fetch the last 3 days of data" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each Date.IsInPreviousNDays([Date modified], 3)), excludehiddenfiles = Table.SelectRows(#"Only fetch the last 3 days of data", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0), #"Get content from json file" = Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, "Transform file", each #"Transform file (11)"([Content])), #"Remove unneeded columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Get content from json file", {"Name", "Transform file"}), #"Expand columns" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Remove unneeded columns", "Transform file", {"resourceId", "timeAccessed"}, {"flowId", "flowRunTime"}), #"Replace errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Expand columns", {{"flowId", type text}, {"flowRunTime", type datetime}}), #"Group by flow id" = Table.Group(#"Replace errors", {"flowId"}, {{"lastRun", each List.Max([flowRunTime]), type nullable datetime}}), // Only keep data where the flow still exists #"Merge with flows" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Group by flow id", {"flowId"}, admin_flows, {"admin_flowid"}, "admin_flows", JoinKind.Inner), #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merge with flows", {{"flowId", type text}, {"lastRun", type datetime}}), #"From Value" = Table.FromValue(#"Changed column type"), #"Remove Columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"From Value", Table.ColumnsOfType(#"From Value", {type table, type record, type list, type nullable binary, type binary, type function})) in #"Remove Columns"; shared #"Sample file (11)" = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(#"DatalakeURL" & "/powerautomate/usage"), #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), Navigation = #"Filtered hidden files"{0}[Content] in Navigation; shared #"Transform file (11)" = let Source = (Parameter as binary) => let Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}), #"Transformed Column" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {"Column1", Json.Document}), #"Expanded Column1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Transformed Column", "Column1", {"tenantId", "environmentId", "resourceId", "timeAccessed", "status", "subType", "runs"}), #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded Column1", {{"tenantId", type text}, {"environmentId", type text}, {"status", type text}, {"subType", type text}, {"resourceId", type text}, {"timeAccessed", type datetime}, {"runs", Int64.Type}}) in #"Changed Type" in Source; shared admin_flows = let Source = OData.Feed(EnvironmentAPI, null, [Implementation = "2.0"]), #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Name = "admin_flows", Signature = "table"]}[Data], #"Keep columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"admin_flowid"}) in #"Keep columns";

<> true),\\n excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0),\\n #\\\"Get content from json file\\\" = Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, \\\"Transform file\\\", each #\\\"Transform file (11)\\\"([Content])),\\n #\\\"Remove unneeded columns\\\" = Table.SelectColumns(#\\\"Get content from json file\\\", {\\\"Name\\\", \\\"Transform file\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Expand columns\\\" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#\\\"Remove unneeded columns\\\", \\\"Transform file\\\", {\\\"resourceId\\\", \\\"timeAccessed\\\"}, {\\\"flowId\\\", \\\"flowRunTime\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Replace errors\\\" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#\\\"Expand columns\\\", {{\\\"flowId\\\", type text}, {\\\"flowRunTime\\\", type datetime}}),\\n #\\\"Group by flow id\\\" = Table.Group(#\\\"Replace errors\\\", {\\\"flowId\\\"}, {{\\\"lastRun\\\", each List.Max([flowRunTime]), type nullable datetime}}),\\n // Only keep data where the flow still exists\\n #\\\"Merge with flows\\\" = Table.NestedJoin(#\\\"Group by flow id\\\", {\\\"flowId\\\"}, admin_flows, {\\\"admin_flowid\\\"}, \\\"admin_flows\\\", JoinKind.Inner),\\n #\\\"Changed column type\\\" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#\\\"Merge with flows\\\", {{\\\"flowId\\\", type text}, {\\\"lastRun\\\", type datetime}}),\\n #\\\"From Value\\\" = Table.FromValue(#\\\"Changed column type\\\"),\\n #\\\"Remove Columns\\\" = Table.RemoveColumns(#\\\"From Value\\\", Table.ColumnsOfType(#\\\"From Value\\\", {type table, type record, type list, type nullable binary, type binary, type function}))\\nin\\n #\\\"Remove Columns\\\";\\nshared #\\\"Sample file (11)\\\" = let\\n Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(#\\\"DatalakeURL\\\" & \\\"/powerautomate/usage\\\"),\\n #\\\"Filtered hidden files\\\" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),\\n Navigation = #\\\"Filtered hidden files\\\"{0}[Content]\\nin\\n Navigation;\\nshared #\\\"Transform file (11)\\\" = let\\n Source = (Parameter as binary) => let\\n Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}),\\n #\\\"Transformed Column\\\" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {\\\"Column1\\\", Json.Document}),\\n #\\\"Expanded Column1\\\" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#\\\"Transformed Column\\\", \\\"Column1\\\", {\\\"tenantId\\\", \\\"environmentId\\\", \\\"resourceId\\\", \\\"timeAccessed\\\", \\\"status\\\", \\\"subType\\\", \\\"runs\\\"}),\\n #\\\"Changed Type\\\" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#\\\"Expanded Column1\\\", {{\\\"tenantId\\\", type text}, {\\\"environmentId\\\", type text}, {\\\"status\\\", type text}, {\\\"subType\\\", type text}, {\\\"resourceId\\\", type text}, {\\\"timeAccessed\\\", type datetime}, {\\\"runs\\\", Int64.Type}})\\nin\\n #\\\"Changed Type\\\"\\nin\\n Source;\\nshared admin_flows = let\\n Source = OData.Feed(EnvironmentAPI, null, [Implementation = \\\"2.0\\\"]),\\n #\\\"Navigation 1\\\" = Source{[Name = \\\"admin_flows\\\", Signature = \\\"table\\\"]}[Data],\\n #\\\"Keep columns\\\" = Table.SelectColumns(#\\\"Navigation 1\\\", {\\\"admin_flowid\\\"})\\nin\\n #\\\"Keep columns\\\";\\n\"},\"annotations\":[{\"name\":\"pbi:QueryGroups\",\"value\":\"null\"}]}"}

msdyn_dataflow.msdyn_mashupdocument:
section Section1; [Description = "Storage account you've set up to receive the Power Platform Data Export. Get the URL by navigating to your Storage Account > Endpoints > Copy the Data Lake Storage endpoint (example https://mypowerpaltformexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform)"] shared DatalakeURL = let DatalakeURL_Apps = "https://pctoolscoedevdataexport.dfs.core.windows.net/powerplatform" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in DatalakeURL_Apps; [Description = "Environment Web API endpoint. Get via make.powerapps.com > Settings Cog > Developer resources > Web API Endpoint value (example https://mycoe.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2)"] shared EnvironmentAPI = let EnvironmentAPI = "https://pptoolsnewcore.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type any] in EnvironmentAPI; shared #"Transform file (2)" = let Source = (Parameter as binary) => let Source = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(Parameter)}), #"Transformed Column" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {"Column1", Json.Document}), #"Expanded Column1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Transformed Column", "Column1", {"resourceId", "connectorType"}), #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded Column1", {{"resourceId", type text}, {"connectorType", type text}}) in #"Changed Type" in Source
/*let Source = (Parameter as binary) => let Source = Text.FromBinary(Parameter), #"Converted JSON" = if Text.StartsWith(Source, "[") then let #"Imported JSON" = Json.Document(Source) in #"Imported JSON" else let #"Imported JSON" = Replacer.ReplaceText(Source, "}", "},"), #"Trim last character" = Text.Trim(#"Imported JSON", ","), #"Insert bracket" = Text.Insert(#"Trim last character", 0, "["), #"Insert second bracket" = Text.Insert(#"Insert bracket", Text.Length(#"Insert bracket"), "]"), #"Parsed JSON" = Json.Document(#"Insert second bracket") in #"Parsed JSON" in #"Converted JSON" in Source*/; shared AppConnRef = let Source = AzureStorage.DataLake(DatalakeURL & "/powerapps/ConnectionReference"), #"Changed modified" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Date modified", type date}}), // Filter to files that have been updated since the last Dataflow refresh OR all files if initial inventory #"Filter to recent" = Table.SelectRows( #"Changed modified", each [Date modified] >= (if List.IsEmpty(DataflowRefresh) then Date.From("1900-01-01") else Date.From(DataflowRefresh{0}))), excludehiddenfiles = Table.SelectRows(#"Filter to recent", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true), excludezerolengthfiles = Table.SelectRows(excludehiddenfiles, each [Attributes]?[Size]? > 0), #"Extract Environment ID from file name" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(excludezerolengthfiles, "EnvironmentNameFromTable", each if Text.Length([Name]) = 41 then Text.Range([Name], 0,36) else Text.Range(Text.AfterDelimiter([Name], "-", 0), 0, 36)), {{"EnvironmentNameFromTable", type text}}), #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Extract Environment ID from file name", {"Extension", "Date accessed", "Date modified", "Date created", "Attributes", "Folder Path", "Name"}), // Only keep files where the environment still exists #"Merged with environments" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Removed columns", {"EnvironmentNameFromTable"}, admin_environments, {"admin_environmentid"}, "admin_environments", JoinKind.Inner), // Parse json document #"Get content from json files" = Table.AddColumn(#"Merged with environments", "Transform file", each #"Transform file (2)"([Content])), #"Expanded file to table" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Get content from json files", "Transform file", {"resourceId", "connectorType"}, {"appId", "connectorName"}), #"Removed errors" = Table.RemoveRowsWithErrors(#"Expanded file to table", {"appId"}), #"Insert unique connector name" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed errors", "connectorSharedName", each Text.AfterDelimiter([connectorName], "/", 3), type text), #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Insert unique connector name", {"appId", "connectorSharedName"}), #"Grouped by app id" = Table.Group(#"Removed duplicates", {"appId"}, {{"Connector Names", each Text.Combine([connectorSharedName], ","), type nullable text}}), #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Grouped by app id", each [Connector Names] <> null), #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"appId", type text}}) in #"Changed column type"; shared admin_environments = let Source = OData.Feed(#"EnvironmentAPI", null, [Implementation = "2.0"]), #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Name = "admin_environments", Signature = "table"]}[Data], #"Keep columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"admin_environmentname", "admin_displayname", "admin_recordguidasstring", "admin_environmentid"}) in #"Keep columns"; shared DataflowRefresh = let Source = OData.Feed(#"EnvironmentAPI" & "/msdyn_dataflowrefreshhistories", null, [Implementation = "2.0"]), #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([msdyn_dataflowname] = "CoE BYODL Apps Connection")), #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Filtered rows", {{"msdyn_starttime", Order.Descending}}), #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Sorted rows", {"msdyn_starttime"}), #"Converted to list" = #"Removed other columns"[msdyn_starttime] in #"Converted to list";
